entry.title: https://github.com/alexed1/LightningFlowComponents
entry.content: A collection of unofficial Flow extensions that can be used to enhance Salesforce Flow and Orchestrator.

entry.title: https://github.com/apex-enterprise-patterns/fflib-apex-common
entry.content: Common Apex Library supporting Apex Enterprise Patterns and much more!

entry.title: https://github.com/apex-enterprise-patterns/fflib-apex-mocks
entry.content: An Apex mocking framework for true unit testing in Salesforce, with Stub API support

entry.title: https://github.com/jongpie/NebulaLogger
entry.content: The most robust observability solution for Salesforce experts. Built 100% natively on the platform, and designed to work seamlessly with Apex, Lightning Components, Flow, OmniStudio, and integrations.

entry.title: https://github.com/mitchspano/apex-trigger-actions-framework
entry.content: A framework for partitioning, ordering, and bypassing trigger logic for applications built on Salesforce.

entry.title: https://github.com/trailheadapps/apex-recipes
entry.content: A library of concise, meaningful examples of Apex code for common use cases following best practices.
